ygData.subject: Re: old but still strong.
ygData.msgSnippet: Veratis shakes his head, Not reformat, more of a download sequence. I have protoforms that need to be  changed into translife forms, I ll simply download your

Subject: Re: old but still strong.

Organization: Prodigy Internet
MIME-Version: 1.0

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Veratis shakes his head, "Not reformat, more of a download sequence. I have
protoforms that need to be  changed into translife forms, I'll simply
download your spark into one of those along with your DNA sequence giving
you a new transformation containing bear and a half bear form." the old bot
paces trying to find the words to make this dimwit bear understand. If it
were a junkion it still wouldn't be Smarter than the average bear.
----- Original Message -----
From: <hugar_twriker@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 20, 2001 8:28 AM
Subject: Re: old but still strong.


OOC:  Sorry, I replyed to this one before, but it didn't get thru.

BIC:
�Grizzltron�


   "So are you going to reformat me?"  Grizzltron says.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Veratis' arched his right eye at the word "Mutant" he'd used the
name to
> describe Razor Claw, Ice, and Silver Scout but he didn't consider
himself as
> one. "I'm more of an alternate breed than a mutant but you're
description is
> adept. You coud have more than most translife forms on this
planet." he
> decided that the talks were going well enough that he could lower
the
> shields around his experiments. As a precaution he kept the
dampening field
> active in case Grizzltron decided to try his optics again. "I could
give you
> more than any faction on this planet, a new form, a place to stay,
an
> education that will carry through past the end of the war." he knew
that he
> was offering alot, he was also prepared to live up to his promisses
in his
> own unique way.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Proto Bot <beastwars@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Friday, July 13, 2001 8:35 AM
> Subject: Re: old but still strong.
>
>
> �Grizzltron�
>
>
>    "So you want to make me some kind of mutant?"
>
>

> >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...
> >To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> >Subject: Re: old but still strong.

> >
> >Veratis realized that he'd have to speak slowly so Grizzltron could
> >understand him. "I'm saying that I could give you peace. In fact I
have a
> >way to give this hole planet peace. I found a way to perfect the
DNA
> >replication process and and make us translife forms more adapted
to a
> >planet." the old bot transformed back to his robotic form as a
show of
> >trust. "You've seen what my mutated half form can do, I'm sure
that you
> >could benefit from such technology." He walked to the side,
keeping his
> >eyes
> >on Grizzltron trying to predict his responce but fealt he needed a
little
> >more prodding. "A half transformation makes you stronger, more
agile, and
> >the ability to repair your damage while retaining your robotic
strength."
> >He
> >smiled a crooked smile and sat down at one of the consoles knowing
that he
> >had the other bots full attention.
> >----- Original Message -----

becoming
> > >much more than you are now." the old bot says watching the other
bot move
> > >carefully. "A chance to relax, a chance to live, a chance to be
a part of
> > >our history." He wasn't being very clear but he was dangling the
bait,
> >now
> > >he waited for Grizzltron to bite.

by a
> > >gernade
> > >then by a sword?  Boy you are dumb.  So what do I get if I join
you?"
> > >Grizzltron says.
> > >
> > >
> > > >From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > > >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...
> > > >To: <nbwrpg@y...>

> > > >
> > > >Sorry Proto, I posted two posts ago that Veratis activated an
anti
> >energy
> > > >system that prevents the use of any energy weapon (Can't have
you
> > >shooting
> > > >up a perfectly good lab now can I?) so your optics can't be
used. To
> >make
> > > >it
> > > >fair the system also prevents Veratis from using energy
weapons.
> > > >
> > > >Grizzltron was faster than Veratis had anticipated, the bot
had avoided
> > >his
> > > >grab and countered just as fast. The old scientist wasn't a
slouch
> >though
> > > >and quickly recovered. Grizzltrons sword nearly connected but
Veratis'
> > > >agile
> > > >half bat form glided backward avoiding the slash. "I give you
one last
> > > >chance to act in a civilized manner before I stop you." The
scientist
> > > >appalled violence in his home and wanted nothing more than
common
> > >courtesy.
> > > >"So what'll it be? will you calm down or do I take you down?"
the old
> >bot
> > > >hovered inches from the ground prepared to fight if necessary,
his
> >beady
> > > >bat
> > > >eyes watched for movement while his snout constantly sent out
sonar
> >waves
> > > >telling him where Grizzletron was at all times. his claws were
held in
> > > >front
> > > >of him in a judo like stance, his wings beat softly keeping
him aloft,
> > >his
> > > >long half robotic legs hung below him slightly bent ready to
push him
> > > >whichever way he needed to go. He'd been in to many fights in
his long
> > >life
> > > >to not know what he was doing and he intended to show the
opponent that
> > >he
> > > >meant business.

> > > >let
> > > >go of the grenade launcher with his left hand.(Now only
holding it with
> > >his
> > > >Right Hand) He took his left hand and grabbed his sword.  He
swung his
> > > >sword
> > > >at Veratis' Right hip.  Grizzltron then fired a Optic at
Veratis while
> > > >saying, "I see said the blind bot."

> > > > >age

without
> > >hurting

calls out,
> > >soon
> > > > >as

weapons making

if this

and the

> > > > > >knew that the bear would run out of Grenades eventually.
Force

> > > > > >in this senseless battle.

> > > >
